37.eng-name: The Book of Clothes and Adornment

hadiths.text: Jabir b. 'Abdullah reported that Abu Qubafa was led (to the andience of the Holy Prophet) on the day of the Conquest of Mecca and his head and beard were white like hyssop, whereupon Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said:Change it with something but avoid black

chapter.ara-name: بَاب اسْتِحْبَابِ خِضَابِ الشَّيْبِ بِصُفْرَةٍ أَوْ حُمْرَةٍ وَتَحْرِيمِهِ بِالسَّوَادِ
chapter.eng-name: It Is Recommended To Dye White Hair With Yellow Or Red Dye, But Black Dye Is Haram
